name: Blindfolded Survival
description:
Game made for BlindJam  https://itch.io/jam/blindjam
NOTE: To play this game stereo headset is required

"Hello, I am your personal A-I assistant. You are stuck in this forest and you are blind folded!
To escape you need to collect 5 devices and return here. You can’t see but you can pay attention to the sounds. The devices emits vibrating kind of sound effect, similar to your smartphone.
Also many beacons are installed for assistance so you can return here.

But, beware of the night monsters! They can sense your movement. So don’t move if a monster chases you. Don’t die! I repeat, Don’t die!

Press W to move. Press A and D to rotate left and right respectively.
You can also press Left Shift with W key to run. But still you won’t out run the night monsters."
